item.title: [639] Item on Object Group Teleport
item.dc:creator: @99rangek0 99rangek0
item.description:
@99rangek0 wrote:

Hello, I want to make it where when I use an item on an object it teleports all the people between lets say X2510, Y4720 to X2513, Y4722 to the location of X2509, Y4710. Basically I’ll try to explain this because the above was not a good example. The first 2 XY coords make about a 3x3 square, what I am trying to do, is when someone uses an item on an object, anyone in that 3x3 square will be teled to the 3rd Coord mentioned. However I can’t figure out how to do it.

Here is my code so far

if (def.getName().toLowerCase().contains("chest")) { if (objId == 2566) { if (itemUsed == 18288) { player.getInventory().deleteItem(18288, 1); player.teleport(184, 4270, 0); } } }
This teleports just the person that uses the item on the object, but I want it to teleport everyone in the specific area as mentioned before.
I’m assuming it would be similar coding to the areas.xml where the SW/NW XY coords are listed to make a defined area. However I am not sure
how I would incorporate the areas.xml coding into ItemonObject.java

Some help would be appreciated ;D

Read full topic
